basic.description: (Fall-Winter Technological Education candidates only).  Provides an introduction to the theoretical underpinnings of teaching and learning in technological education. Using creative activity to promote high school students' intellectual growth is a particular focus of readings and discussions. Course activities provide opportunities to combine knowledge from educational research with experience in order to promote, and assess, quality student learning and to develop an informed approach to professional practice.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Teaching Tech Ed, Pt 2
